description: Freezer was the main antagonist in the Freezer Saga of http://anidb.net/a1530 [Dragon Ball Z]. He`s an alien tyrant with plans of universal domination. He`s cunning, charismatic, arrogant, imperative and, of course, powerful. He possesses different abilities such as ki manipulation and transformation. He also has high survivability, as he could live on even when wounded and thrown away into outer space.
name: Freezer
